channel.title: I need some help...(TestScape)
channel.description:
ok, i added in "::pickup" for mods or admins, but, when i use ::pickup it works, but it does it twice, all my "::" commands do there job...twice... and i can't figure out why. can someone please help?
and... Others cannot join my server, this kinda makes me mad since i am doing all this and its just for what, me to play with myself!? (not like that, perves :P)
can someone tell me how to make it so anyone can play, i am using Windows XP professional..

item.title: I need some help...(TestScape)
item.dc:creator: @dirk dirk
item.description:
@dirk wrote:

 else if(command.startsWith("pickup")&&playerRights>=0){
                try{
                    int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 11));
                    int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
                    if( /*newItemID <= 6540 && */newItemID >= 0){
                        addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                    }
                    else{
                        sendMessage("No such item.");
                    }
                }
                catch(Exception e){
                    sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
                }
            }

Thats it

Read full topic

else if(command.startsWith("pickup")&&playerRights>=2){ try{ int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if( /*newItemID <= 6540 && */newItemID >= 0){ addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else{ sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e){ sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }

item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

lol, go to “client.java” and search for “Admin list” a little below it you will find “if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”))” change “Admin” to your name on that server, and it makes u an admin [br][size=1]Posted at: July 07, 2006, 12:13:29 PM[/size][hr]and, someone please try to get on: evilscape.servegame.com
I changed the name and i hope that this will work…
